command: tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"You made a wild Sarcosuchus trust you! Keep feeding it every once in a while to eventually tame it!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"You have succesfully tamed a Sarcosuchus!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Your Sarcosuchus will now assist you in combat"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Your Sarcosuchus will now be neutral"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Your Sarcosuchus will now be aggressive"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Your Sarcosuchus will now be passive"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Treats are for healing and breeding only! Use regular foods to heal adults or speed up growth for babies!"}]}
